Sentencas: A novel two-phase mixed oxide-ion and carbonate-ion conductor (MOCC) has been recently developed for intermediate temperature solid-oxide fuel cells and CO2 separation membranes.
Titulo: High conductivity mixed oxide-ion and carbonate-ion conductors supported by a prefabricated porous solid-oxide matrix

Sentencas: With conventional mixing-pressing ceramic fabrication technique it is difficult to obtain a MOCC with high mechanical strength and high oxide-ion conductivity clue to the low sintering temperature.
Titulo: High conductivity mixed oxide-ion and carbonate-ion conductors supported by a prefabricated porous solid-oxide matrix

Sentencas: In this study, a samarium doped ceria (SDC, Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9) is selected to demonstrate the prefabrication of porous matrix by the sacrificial template methodology with Ni as the template material.
Titulo: High conductivity mixed oxide-ion and carbonate-ion conductors supported by a prefabricated porous solid-oxide matrix

Sentencas: The microstructure of the SDC matrix characterized with a 3D X-ray computed tomography and a SEM imaging reveals a uniform distribution of homogeneous micro-pores across the solid-oxide matrix.
Titulo: High conductivity mixed oxide-ion and carbonate-ion conductors supported by a prefabricated porous solid-oxide matrix

Sentencas: A Li-Na-carbonate-impregnated MOCC supported by a 40% porous SDC matrix shows an effective ionic conductivity of 0.55 and 0.46 S/cm at 650 and 600 degrees C, respectively, the highest values reported so far among similar systems.
Titulo: High conductivity mixed oxide-ion and carbonate-ion conductors supported by a prefabricated porous solid-oxide matrix
High conductivity mixed oxide-ion and carbonate-ion conductors supported by a prefabricated porous solid-oxide matrix
High conductivity mixed oxide-ion and carbonate-ion conductors supported by a prefabricated porous solid-oxide matrix
